participant_1.background:
I grew up with them, and we've been close ever since.
boating is my favorite activity.
i wish i didn t have to work.
I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I'm not worried about the weather because I'm inside, listening to music with my friends.

participant_2.background:
I'm not sure about their professions, but my parents are usually busy and tired when they get home from work.
I would love to have lunch with Amelia Earhart, the pioneering female pilot who inspired me to become a pilot myself.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I was a personal shopper, but I decided to change my career because I wanted to do something more meaningful.
I am proud of my brother for achieving his dream of playing football in the NFL.

content.text: Not much. Just got back from the gym.
Nice! Me too. I was feeling pretty sluggish, so I decided to go for a run.
I know the feeling. After a long day at work, it's hard to find the motivation to work out.
Yeah. But I'm glad I did. I feel much better now.
Me too. I'm about to make some dinner. What are you up to?
I'm going to go for a walk with my dog. He's been cooped up in the house all day, and he needs to get some exercise.
That sounds nice. I wish I could go with you, but I have to start dinner.
No problem. I'll send you a picture of him later.
Thanks! I love seeing pictures of my furry little friend.
I'm on my way out now. I'll talk to you later.
